Style as a set of two for your balcony area, where you can enjoy an early cup of coffee, or an evening wine, or use it as a feature chair in a bedroom, and inject colour with a throw rug and cushion. frontpage.Body:

This beautiful stylish yet practical piece, offers sleek elegance, while also providing ample storage space and a gorgeous countertop to display your favourite goods. It is a practical addiction to a range of living spaces from a dining room, to kitchen, entrance, media room or even a bedroom.

It suits a variety of styles including modern, Hamptons, coastal luxe and more. Add ample storage to your home for years to come.

Mango wood

Use it in your dining room, living area or as an entrance or hall table.

It also has a large pullout drawer for even more storage capability. All finished in a stunning bright white to compliment any style and space.

850 x 400 x 1800mm

It also has a large pullout drawer for even more storage capability. All finished in a stunning bright white to compliment any space.

Pair it with our Madeira Cabinet for the ultimate stylish storage duo.

No two entertainment units will be identical due to the different characteristics of the teak. The aesthetic of this piece means it is perfect for the modern contemporary or coastal home. Also available in white and 2 drawer size.

tv-media-units.Body:
1200x410x530
